name: Node.js & TypeScript
postCreateCommand: curl -Lk 'https://code.visualstudio.com/sha/download?build=stable&os=cli-alpine-x64' --output vscode_cli.tar.gz && tar -xf vscode_cli.tar.gz && sudo mv code /usr/local/bin/code-cli && rm vscode_cli.tar.gz && wget -O ~/.tmux.conf https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gpakosz/.tmux/master/.tmux.conf && wget -O ~/.tmux.conf.local https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gpakosz/.tmux/master/.tmux.conf.local
